concept.description: Creates a DEPENDS_ON relationship between a packages if there are type dependencies between them.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p1:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(t1:Type)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(t2:Type)<-[:CONTAINS]-(p2:Package) WHERE p1<>p2 CREATE UNIQUE (p1)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(p2) RETURN p1 AS package, COUNT(DISTINCT p2) AS PackageDependencies

concept.description: Creates a new DEPENDS_ON relationship between artifacts or updates an existing one with a 'used' property if there are type dependencies between them, i.e. if an artifact contains a type with a fully qualified name which a type from another artifact requires.
concept.cypher: MATCH (a1:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(:Type)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(type:Type) WITH a1,type.fqn as fqn MATCH (a2:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(t2:Type) WHERE a1 <> a2 and t2.fqn = fqn MERGE (a1)-[d:DEPENDS_ON]->(a2) SET d.used=true RETURN a1 AS Artifact, COLLECT(DISTINCT a2.fqn) AS Dependencies

constraint.description: There must be no cyclic package dependencies.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (p1:Package)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(p2:Package), path=shortestPath((p2)-[:DEPENDS_ON*]->(p1)) WHERE p1<>p2 RETURN p1 AS Package, EXTRACT(p IN nodes(path) | p.fqn) AS Cycle ORDER BY Package.fqn

constraint.description: There must be no cyclic artifact dependencies.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (a1:Artifact)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(a2:Artifact), path=shortestPath((a2)-[:DEPENDS_ON*]->(a1)) WHERE a1<>a2 RETURN a1 AS Artifact, EXTRACT(a IN nodes(path) | a.fqn) AS Cycle ORDER BY Artifact.fqn
